page.title: 07Impressions of our area(9)
page.content: It has many{busy}roads which demand care from pedestrians and drivers. At school we are taught the importance of {road safety and the Green Cross Code. It is a wealthier and better kept area than most of Sandwell. Many people have well paid jobs and a concern for the area. Being a child in this area has many advantages such as{pocket money}of between 75p and Â£2 per week to buy sweets, comics or records. Close by are{Warley and Lightwoods Parks where{children}can{play. Scouts, {Guides, Girls & Boys Brigades and {Sunday School}are organisations attended. Martial arts, swimming and running are popular{sports. Most families leave the area for weekly{shopping.}They go to supermarkets in Bearwood, Smethwick or Oldbury. Local shops are still active.
